title: Magic Elemental Spells
description: A sound pack of magical elemental spells, containing 200 sound effects, including air, fire, water, earth and ice.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/magic-elemental-spells

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/8a610pqg5uiygwj/MSE%20-%20Magic%20Elemental%20Spells_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


A collection of magical elemental spells, containing air, fire, water, earth and ice.


The package includes 200 sound effects divided into 5 folders - "Air", "Earth", "Fire", "Ice", "Water":


  • The "Air" folder contains 20 magical spells
  • The "Earth" folder contains 20 magical spells
  • The "Fire" folder contains 60 magical spells
  • The "Ice" folder contains 50 magical spells
  • The "Water" folder contains 50 magical spells


Use this asset to create magical spells for mages, shamans, good and evil wizards in your game scenes, or use these spells to produce sound for individual gameplay events.Â 


You can also mix sound effects with each other to create even more sound variations.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 200 sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 60 fire spells
  • 50 water spells
  • 20 air spells
  • 50 ice spells
  • 20 earth spells
  • great for RPGs, strategies, casual games in the Fantasy, Dark Fantasy genre


Number of Audio Waves: 200

Number of Audio Cues: 200

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 10 minutes 24 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
